scripts.build:ios:nativescript: cd nativescript && tns build ios --env.uglify && cp -R platforms/ios/nativescript/app ../runtime/ios-runtime/projects/MyApp/
scripts.build:android:nativescript: cd nativescript && tns build android  --env.uglify && cp -R platforms/android/app/src/main/assets/app ../runtime/android-runtime/test-app/app/src/main/assets/
scripts.build:android:dest: node android/pkg.js && cp build/app-android runtime/android-runtime/test-app/app/src/main/assets/nodejs-project/ && cp build/app-android.js runtime/android-runtime/test-app/app/src/main/assets/nodejs-project/
scripts.build:ios:dest: node ios/pkg.js && cp build/app-ios runtime/ios-runtime/projects/MyApp/nodejs-project/ && cp build/app-ios.js runtime/ios-runtime/projects/MyApp/nodejs-project/
scripts.build:ios: npm run build:ios:dest && npm run build:ios:nativescript
scripts.build:android: npm run build:android:dest && npm run build:android:nativescript
scripts.prebuild:apk: if [ ! -d ../../../dist ]; then cd ../../../;npm run build; fi
scripts.build:apk: npm run build:android:dest && cd android-dist && ./gradlew build
